mapper.sql: id, order_no, express_id,express_type ,status, amount, is_finished, version, creator, created_time, modifier, modified_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into order_info
id,
order_no,
express_id,
express_type,
status,
amount,
is_finished,
version,
creator,
created_time,
modifier,
modified_time,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isFinished,jdbcType=BIT},
#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update order_info
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
express_type = #{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_finished = #{isFinished,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update order_info set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, express_type = #{expressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_finished = #{isFinished,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select o.* from order_info o
and o.status = #{status}
and o.order_no like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY o.created_time desc
